newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum 6.37 pct at Italy BOT buyback.
newsitem.headline: Minimum 6.37 pct at Italy BOT buyback.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 4.5 trillion lire buyback of short term Treasury bills (BOTs) by the Bank of Italy was 6.37 percent compared with 6.80 percent previously, the Bank said.
The average rate was 6.41 percent against 6.87 percent at the previous operation for 2.0 trillion lire on March 14 of which the Bank bought back a total of 2.0 trillion.
The Bank said it received 19 bids of which five were met in full and two in part.
